name: Odyssey of Dremid'ir PRE-ALPHA
description:
Odyssey of Dremid'ir is a story-driven, open world 2D RPG, set in the gritty hand drawn world of Dremid'ir; a fantasy world of monsters and magic, caught in a post-apocalypse after its god-like creators have been destroyed. In Odyssey, you play an unsuspecting magi, Codrin, on a quest to find safety and salvation in a world full of volatile magic, and creatures beyond reckoning, while exploring ruined cities, mountains, lost forests, and deep caverns.

If you find any issues, have suggestions or want to share something regarding the game, drop a comment or let us know on the Discord server! In case of a found bug, screenshots and ways to reproduce it are much appreciated!

Keybinds:
[I] - Open inventory
[W, A, S, D + arrows] - Move
[Enter] - Select
[Esc/Backspace] - Leave menu
[E] - Interact
Debug Keybinds:
[`/0] - God mode toggle. You can fly through objects and triggers while active. (0.1c-)
[4] - Kill the first enemy in battle. (0.1d-)
[5] - Kill a random party member in battle. (0.1d-)
[6] - End battle with the outcome of enemies winning. (0.1d-)
[8] - Cycle through states of party members: Collision off - Collision and visibility off - Collision and visibility on (0.1f-)
[9] - Toggle console output visibility. Might show us useful information, in case you softlock. (0.1d-)
[Mouse scroll] - Camera zoom in/out. Press to reset. (0.1f-)
[0 (on US keyboard)/Character on the right of 9] - Camera movement mode toggle. (0.1f-)
(Debug keybinds may crash the game if you use them under invalid conditions, like trying to kill an enemy once there's none left)

Attention: This is a first iteration pre-alpha build. It is incomplete and may lack functionality or graphics for particular actions. As of now, this itch page exists solely to showcase the progression of the game and let a closer group of people provide us feedback so that we can prepare a banger demo for a wider audience.
